Test Name: Adenovirus DNA Detection and Quantification, Plasma
Purpose: To detect and quantify adenovirus DNA in plasma samples using quantitative real-time PCR (qPCR).
Equipment: qPCR instrument (e.g., Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Real-Time PCR System), nucleic acid extraction system (e.g., QIAcube), micropipettes, centrifuge, vortex mixer, qPCR reaction plates/tubes
